FILE: cm210365v11.0.txtDYAD: NETHERLANDS - RUSSIA/USSRRIVALRY: RIV494DISPUTE(S): MID3351 RIVALRY: RIV495DISPUTE(S): MID2226 RIVALRY: RIV2006DISPUTE(S): MID4342 PS-NOTES:PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180212PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180212Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues VariablesWWI MIDs: MID3351 MID2226 TERRMID: MID2226 3 -- not territory TERRMID-CER: MID2226 1 -- certain TERRMID-NOTES: TERRLINK: MID2226 3 -- not third party link to territory TERRLINK-CER: MID2226 1 -- certain TERRLINK-NOTES: MARITMID: MID2226 3 -- not maritime MARITMID-CER: MID2226 1 -- certain MARITMID-NOTES: MID2226 from cm002365 narrative, this involves a show of ships, or a mutual display of naval power, between USSR and several NATO countries, including Netherlands. Coded not maritime because Netherlands and USSR were not disputing a maritime boundary here, and this seems to be a product of general Cold War tensions. ISLMID: MID2226 3 -- not islands ISLMID-CER: MID2226 1 -- certain ISLMID-NOTES: CIVWARMID: MID2226 3 -- not civil war CIVWARMID-CER: MID2226 1 -- certain CIVWARMID-NOTES:CIVWARLINK: MID2226 3 -- not civil war link CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2226 1 -- certain CIVWARLINK-NOTES: COUPMID: MID2226 3 -- not coup COUPMID-CER: MID2226 1 -- certain COUPMID-NOTES: COUPLINK: MID2226 3 -- not coup linkCOUPLINK-CER: MID2226 1 -- certain COUPLINK-NOTES: MID4342 TERRMID: MID4342 3 -- not territory TERRMID-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain TERRMID-NOTES: TERRLINK: MID4342 1 -- third party link to territorialTERRLINK-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain TERRLINK-NOTES: MID4342 from Gibler (2018), this is connected to a NATO bombing in Yugoslavia. Russia put its forces on high alert and warned NATO against provoking a broader war. Coded third party link to territorial MID because Nertherlands, as part of NATO, and Russia were supporting opposite sides of the Yugoslavian Wars, a series of territorial disputes. MARITMID: MID4342 3 -- not maritime MARITMID-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain MARITMID-NOTES: ISLMID: MID4342 3 -- not islands ISLMID-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain ISLMID-NOTES: CIVWARMID: MID4342 3 -- not civil war CIVWARMID-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain CIVWARMID-NOTES:CIVWARLINK: MID4342 1 -- civil war link CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain CIVWARLINK-NOTES: MID4342 from Gibler (2018), this involves Netherlands (as part of NATO) war activity in Yugoslavia, who Russia was supporting. Coded civil war link because the Yugoslav Wars featured extensive violence by militarized rebel groups organized along ethnic lines, and the various states experiencing this violence all lie outside this dyad. COUPMID: MID4342 3 -- not coup COUPMID-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain COUPMID-NOTES: COUPLINK: MID4342 3 -- not coup linkCOUPLINK-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain COUPLINK-NOTES: MID3 1993-2001:MID4342rivalry=210365 nationa=RUSSIA/USSR nationb=NETHERLANDS MID4342 19990408-19990419  revtype1a=POLICY revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=DISPLAY OF FORCE  revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0lhostb=NO MILITARIZED ACTION First day of dispute was on 4/8/1999 and last day of dispute was on 4/19/1999.NO DISPUTE NARRATIVE AVAILABLE FROM COWRIVNOTES: RIV2006: new rivalry because MID4342 was added by MID3.02NARRATIVE-CM:SOURCES-CM:NARRATIVE-CR:SOURCES-CR:SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
